name: Wiggin LLP
goal: Wiggin is a media, IP and technology law firm, whose lawyers are experts in their fields. Wiggin provides legal, commercial and policy advice to national, European and international clients.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Information Society, Internal Market, Sport, Taxation
euInitiatives: Legal services to clients in the field of EU law, including in particular copyright law and audiovisual regulation.
customers: 21st Century Fox,Motion Picture Association,CBS Studios International
